3c82f619-3c57-42a2-80c3-e99dfb51bac3.description: Earners of this credential have learned the fundamentals of emotional styles of leadership and demonstrated their understanding of the intersection between their own mindset and how they show up to lead others in the workplace. Professional Instruction provided by guest facilitator: Kelly Mannel, SHRM-SCP, CEIC. Founder, Image Partners, Inc., and eiGlobal, Inc. Each earner's badge designates them as one of the 1M trauma-informed leaders trained by 2031.
3c82f619-3c57-42a2-80c3-e99dfb51bac3.name: Leading Through Situational Styles of Leadership & Mindset

alignments.name: Governance, Leadership & Workplace
alignments.description: Dawn Emerick Consulting's Power of 3 framework & training meet one or more of the six National Standard Domains for Trauma-Informed Leadership & Workplace. The Domains include: Governance, Leadership and Workplace; Environment and Safety; Hiring, On-boarding, and Retention; Supervision, Support and Engagement; Workforce Development; Systems Change

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the course and pass the Concept Quiz on Leading Through Situational Styles of Leadership and Mindset consisting of a 1 hour of live, virtual training.
